DataElement.preferredName: Patient Prior Registration Laboratory Procedure Eligibility Determination Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment prior to the act of enrolling on a clinical trial was performed as part of the determination of the suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Prior Registration Laboratory Procedure Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment prior to the act of enrolling on a clinical trial as a determination of the suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Prior Registration Laboratory Procedure Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Registration; the act of enrolling.:A medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body. Tests can help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working, or monitor the disease over time.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: The following laboratory valu
ReferenceDocuments.description: The following laboratory values obtained <=7 days prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Pretreatment tests/procedures must be completed <= 7 days prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Adequate bone marrow, hepatic and renal function prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF1 Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Physical examination, rectal examination and transrectal ultrasound have been done within 6 months prior to randomization and radiographic studies, if indicated, are negative for metastasis

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Adequate hepatic function must be met as evidenced by total serum bilirubin <= 1.5 mg/dL (patients with total bilirubin >1.5 mg/dL eligible only with Gilbert's syndrome); alkaline phosphatase <2.5 times the upper limit of normal; and/or, SGOT (AST) <1.5 times upper limit of normal [alkaline phosphatase and SGOT (AST) cannot both exceed the upper limit of normal]

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: The following laboratory values obtained <= 14 days prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Within 3 months prior to entry, the patient must have a baseline left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) measured by MUGA scan >= 55

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: The following laboratory values obtained <=15 days prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have both bilirubin and AST/ALT greater than ULN?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were tests to determine eligibility performed during the indicated period

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text12
ReferenceDocuments.description: The following laboratory values obtained <= 28 days prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text11
ReferenceDocuments.description: The following laboratory values obtained <= 21 days prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text13
ReferenceDocuments.description: The following laboratory values obtained within 7 days of first CYT107 injection

ReferenceDocuments.name: ACRIN 6690
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the participant's bilirubin level been shown to be higher than 3.0 mg/dL within the past 28 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies performed within 7 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: The following eligibility laboratory values were obtained <= 30 days prior to registration on study

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 14 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ALT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were the following laboratory values obtained within 2 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to enrollment unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAF151 Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have adequate organ function, including adequate renal function defined as eGFR greater than or equal to 40 mL/min/1.73m2 as calculated per institution standard of care, and meeting local site requirements for intravenous administration of gadolinium-based MRI contrast agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAI141 CRF
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does participant have adequate organ function, including adequate renal function defined as eGFR greater than or equal to 40 mL/min/1.73m2 as calculated per institution standard of care, and meeting local site requirements for intravenous administration of gadolinium-based MRI contrast agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days of starting systemic therapy unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days of starting protocol-directed systemic therapy unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were tests to determine eligibility performed during the indicated period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical studies (e.g. cardiac imaging, pulmonary function tests, if applicable), obtained within 21 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 21 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy (repeat if necessary) unless otherwise indicated?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 21 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy (repeat if necessary) unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Were disease/staging imaging studies to determine eligibility performed within 3 days prior to enrollment and within 28 days prior to the projected surgery date?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were disease/staging imaging studies to determine eligibility performed within 3 days prior to enrollment and within 28 days prior to the projected surgery date?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Were all clinical and laboratory studies, if applicable, performed within 21 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy (repeat if necessary) unless otherwise indicated?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies, if applicable, performed within 21 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy (repeat if necessary) unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical studies (eg, cardiac imaging, pulmonary function tests, bilateral BMA/BX and CSF analysis), if applicable, obtained within 28 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical studies (eg, cardiac imaging, pulmonary function tests, bilateral BMA/BX and CSF analysis), if applicable, obtained within 28 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all disease/staging imaging studies to determine eligibility performed within 28 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all of the treatment eligibility criteria to begin HCT conditioning regimen performed within 4 weeks of starting this therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to enrollment unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all disease/staging imaging studies obtained  within 28 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to enrollment unless otherwise indicated?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to enrollment unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 24
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all of the treatment criteria to begin HCT conditioning regimen performed within 4 weeks of starting this therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical studies (eg, cardiac imaging, pulmonary function tests), if applicable, obtained within 28 days prior to start of protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all disease/staging imaging studies, if applicable, obtained within 28 days prior to start of protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 25
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all disease/staging imaging studies obtained within 28 days prior to enrollment and start of protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all clinical and laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 14 days prior to enrollment unless otherwise indicated?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are all laboratory studies to determine eligibility performed within 7 days prior to enrollment?
